宣言俱乐部是复合空间也是我的(家)。这里通过网页集成，不仅是玩乐、想象和交换的场地，更是由(门)服务器自托管的数据库。

ManifestoClub is a composite space and also my (home). Through web integration, it serves not only as a place for fun, imagination and exchange, but more essentially as a self-hosted database powered by (men) server.
